=============
Documentation
=============

Modalic aims to provide an open-source MLOps Platform for performing Federated Learning.


Get started using the :ref:`getting-started` or by reading about the :ref:`key concepts<concepts>`.

-------

    :maxdepth: 1

    installation
    getting-started
    tutorials-and-examples/index
    concepts
    sdk/index
